courses.title: INDUSTRIAL TRAINING
syllabus: Undergo industrial training for a minimum period of 4 weeks
Training may be taken in a phased manner during the vacation starting from the end of third semester to the end of seventh semester
Submit training report in prescribed format to the department
Make a presentation of the training report
Report should include certificates issued by the industry

courses.title: PROJECT WORK
syllabus: Project work may be carried out in the institution/industry/research laboratory or any other competent institutions
Duration of the project work shall be a minimum of 16 weeks which may be extended up to 24 weeks
Mid-semester evaluation of the project work shall be done after about 8 weeks
Interim project report on the progress of the work shall be submitted to the department during the mid-semester evaluation
Final evaluation and viva-voice will be conducted after submission of the final project report in the prescribed form
Student has to make a presentation on the work carried out before the department committee as part of project evaluation
